original_title: A Girl Like You with a Boy Like Me
overview: Today and more than ever, Bhadraksh is determined to end a long period of doubt. In a few moments, he will announce to the one he has always loved that he wants to end the relationship. Bhadraksh is a guide, a shepherd, a lighthouse standing proudly in the midst of the ocean, a rampart against masculine weakness.
title: A Girl Like You with a Boy Like Me
